amendment.description: To add CARICOM Countries and the Dominican Republic to Priority List of HIV/AIDS Coordinator.

vote.text: Amendment SA 685 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 183.

action.text: Amendment SA 685 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR 5/15/2003 S6481-6484; text: CR 5/15/2003 S6481-6482) To add CARICOM Countries and the Dominican Republic to Priority List of HIV/AIDS Coordinator.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 685 proposed by Senator Dodd.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 685 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 183.
